title: @everyone that's asking where urf is
body:
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/announcing-rotating-game-mode-queue
learn to fucking read.
holy shit its not going to come out during april fools, but its gonna be coming out not once, but TWICE, later on in the year.
fuck off with your shit threads, no one wants to hear it.

replies.body: Rotating queue weekend....... weekend has 2 days............... 2 times appearing in rotating queu...... 2+2=4.... usual ammount of time URF is up for on april fools is 14 days....... urf is now delayed when there has been so much hype for it and also a reduced ammount of overall time it's up for. Now can you see why so many people are upset?

> [{quoted}](name=NoxPegasus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QbMr9cL6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-01T22:15:00.561+0000)
>
> Rotating queue weekend....... weekend has 2 days............... 2 times appearing in rotating queu...... 2+2=4.... usual ammount of time URF is up for on april fools is 14 days....... urf is now delayed when there has been so much hype for it and also a reduced ammount of overall time it's up for. Now can you see why so many people are upset?

no, because its not even that good. its get ruined by tryhards playing tryhard champions. I play urf to have fun and fuck around, not get my shit stomped in by a team of nidalee, ez, soraka, hecarim and sona.
also, people would bitch on forums for the rest of the year about bringing urf back, and it got pretty fucking annoying, so I have no patience for anyone that complains even the slightest bit about the game mode apart from when its about tryhards.
Boy you really don't have anything better to cry about do you? Clearly the couple of you against the hundreds.. or thousands across multiple servers, would disagree.

Make that millions.
Anyone who doesn't like URF has some serious hatrid for humanity. However anyone who cries that URF isn't coming this year needs to sit back and let Draven shine. {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}}

> [{quoted}](name=gragaaaaaaas,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QbMr9cL6,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-04-02T00:15:08.146+0000)
>
> Boy you really don't have anything better to cry about do you? Clearly the couple of you against the hundreds.. or thousands across multiple servers, would disagree.

honestly I shouldn't expect people that play league to have good taste in games, they do play league and for most players it is their favourite game.
but that doesn't change the fact that URF isn't that good and is ruined further by the community every time its released.
When is URF coming?
Soon™
Omg you're back ♥
And everyone who read than and is still asking where URF is thought that was the April Fools Joke. Jokes over, now for one of the 2 weekends of URF, this one, though to next one.

> [{quoted}](name=420 BilI Murray,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QbMr9cL6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-01T22:09:46.377+0000)
>
> And everyone who read than and is still asking where URF is thought that was the April Fools Joke. Jokes over, now for one of the 2 weekends of URF, this one, though to next one.

they announced it near the start of march.
anyone that thought it was an april fools joke is legit retarded.
I think you're missing what the idea of an April Fools joke is and how Riot tends to handle them....

> [{quoted}](name=Gesteppie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QbMr9cL6,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-01T22:28:03.344+0000)
>
> I think you're missing what the idea of an April Fools joke is and how Riot tends to handle them....

but it clearly wasn't an april fools joke. that's the point.
And it wasn't clearly made. THAT is the point.

> [{quoted}](name=Gesteppie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QbMr9cL6,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-01T22:45:31.613+0000)
>
> And it wasn't clearly made. THAT is the point.

it was clearly made. it was released like a month before april fools. unlike the actual april fools.

Yet again you've missed the point -__-

I'm not going to bother explaining it to you seeings how you're too set in your own ways.
Your part of the rabble of idiots mate Riot clearly stated this a while ago it's your own fault that you missed it

I didn't miss anything. I know what they wrote. I can understand English quite fine thank you very much.
What you don't seem to understand is empathy and the massive hype Riot likes to put around their April Fools releases.
I knew they weren't going to release it on 1st April, due to the fact that you state very clearly, that they wrote they aren't. BUT because of the actions of last year and the year prior, people hoped that it was all just a big joke and they were going to play along and make the majority player base happy. Most people associate April Fools with U.R.F because of previous years. Your own failure to acknowledge this is not my problem.

People thought it was a joke even though it was stated Riot hoped people wouldn't want people to think it was a joke... If you thought it was still happening even after everything that was said, well that's on you.

Actually, RIOT also said last year that they wouldn't have URF on April first, but that was the April fools and we did get it, so ofcourse we will expect the same this year

Ever heard of the story of the Shepherd and the wolves?

Are you serious? Of course we can FKING read it man. It's just that we won't get urf if they don't release it now. We will only get 6-8 days of urf with this new rotation. That is why everyone is pissed, don't you get that? And too people who thinks urf gets boring, go die... Just jks, but still, pull your head in, it doesn't get boring! XD
Wait is urf not happening this year?

It is, just probably not in the way everyone wants it. It will be part of the[ new rotating weekend queue](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/announcing-rotating-game-mode-queue) that is currently out on PBE. Everyone wants their two solid weeks of april urfdom though.
I agree. Urf isn't even fun for that long, you have a couple days of enjoying it, then it gets super stale. The whole Draven thing is a nice change from Urf.
